name: Manner
description: Vanilla wafer with a lemon creme filling. Overnight steep.
author: altneurose

reviews.text: Recently tried this recipe after getting INW Lemon. I would never have thought to try biscuit at this % but it really does work and goes great with the lemon. Love how simple and tasty it is, a great vape.
Super simple, yet deeply satisfying. This is still one of my favorite recipes. Could never have imagined how buttery INW Biscuit becomes at this %.
Very simple, yet yummy. I get the feeling that something's missing, but overall it's a pretty solid simple recipe. INW Lemon is delcious. Thank you for sharing!
